entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
